amendment.description: Amendment prohibits contracts or subcontracts to any person who intentionally affixes "Made in America" labels or other similar inscriptions to products not made in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit any funds appropriated in the bill from being used to award a contract to any person convicted of falsely attaching a "Made in America" lable to an product not made in the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Traficant amendment (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
